doc: Scarlett Johansson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scarlett_Johansson 1 Scarlett Ingrid Johansson (; born November 22, 1984) is an American actress and singer. Johansson is the world's highest-paid actress, has made multiple appearances in the Forbes Celebrity 100, and has a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame. She aspired to be an actress from a young age, and first appeared on stage in an Off-Broadway play as a child. Johansson made her film debut in the fantasy comedy North (1994), and was nominated for an Independent Spirit Award for Manny Lo (1996). She gained further recognition for her work in The Horse Whisperer (1998) and Ghost World (2001). Johansson shifted to adult roles in 2003 with her performances in Lost in Translation (for which she won a BAFTA Award for Best Actress) and Girl with a Pearl Earring. She was nominated for four Golden Globe Awards for these films, and for playing an estranged teenager in the drama A Love Song for Bobby Long (2004), and a seductress in the psychological thriller Match Point (2005). Other films during this period include the mystery thriller The Prestige (2006) and the comedy-drama Vicky Cristina Barcelona (2008). She also released two albums: Anywhere I Lay My Head (2008) and Break Up (2009), both of which charted on the Billboard 200. In 2010, Johansson debuted on Broadway in a revival of A View from the Bridge, which won her a Tony Award for Best Featured Actress. Later that year, she began portraying Black Widow in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. She voiced an intelligent computer operating system in the 2013 comedy-drama Her, and played an alien in the 2013 science fiction film Under the Skin, and a woman with psychokinetic abilities in the 2014 science fiction action Lucy. She was the highest-grossing actress of 2016, and is also the highest-grossing actress of all time in North America in nominal dollar terms. As a public figure, Johansson is a Hollywood sex symbol. She is a prominent celebrity brand endorser, and also supports various charities and causes. She has been married twice, to the Canadian actor Ryan Reynolds from 2008 to 2011 and the French businessman Romain Dauriac (with whom she has a daughter) from 2014 to 2017. Scarlett_Ingrid_Johansson ( ; born November_22_,_1984 ) is an_American_actress_and_singer . Johansson is the_world 's_highest-paid_actress , has_made multiple_appearances in the_Forbes_Celebrity_100 , and has a_star on the_Hollywood_Walk of Fame . She aspired_to_be an_actress from a_young_age , and first_appeared on stage in an_Off-Broadway_play as a_child . Johansson made her_film_debut in the_fantasy_comedy_North_(_1994_) , and was_nominated for an_Independent_Spirit_Award for Manny_(_1996_) . She gained further_recognition for her_work in The_Horse_Whisperer_(_1998_)_and_Ghost_World ( 2001_) . Johansson shifted to adult_roles in 2003 with her_performances in Lost in Translation ( for which she won a_BAFTA_Award for_Best_Actress_) and Girl with a_Pearl_Earring . She was_nominated for four_Golden_Globe_Awards for these_films , and for playing an_estranged_teenager in the_drama_A_Love_Song for Bobby_Long_(_2004_) , and a_seductress in the_psychological_thriller_Match_Point_(_2005_) . Other_films during this_period include the_mystery_thriller The_Prestige_(_2006_) and the_comedy-drama_Vicky_Cristina_Barcelona_(_2008_) . She also released two_albums : Anywhere I Lay My_Head_(_2008_) and Break Up_(_2009_) , both of which charted on the_Billboard_200 . In 2010 , Johansson debuted on Broadway in a_revival of A_View from the_Bridge , which won her a_Tony_Award for Best_Featured_Actress . Later that_year , she began_portraying Black_Widow in the_Marvel_Cinematic_Universe . She voiced an_intelligent_computer_operating_system in the_2013_comedy-drama_Her , and played an_alien in the_2013_science_fiction_film Under the_Skin , and a_woman with psychokinetic_abilities in the_2014_science_fiction_action_Lucy . She was the_highest-grossing_actress of 2016 , and is also the_highest-grossing_actress of all_time in North_America in nominal_dollar_terms . As a_public_figure , Johansson is a_Hollywood_sex_symbol . She is a_prominent_celebrity_brand_endorser , and also supports various_charities_and_causes . She has_been_married twice , to the_Canadian_actor_Ryan_Reynolds from 2008 to 2011 and the_French_businessman_Romain_Dauriac ( with whom she has a_daughter_) from 2014 to 2017 . 22 , 1984 ) is an American actress and singer . {PERSON[Johansson]} is the world 's highest-paid actress , has made multiple appearances in the Forbes Celebrity 100 , and has a star on the {ORGANIZATION[Hollywood_Walk_of_Fame]} . She aspired to be an actress from a young age , and first appeared on stage in an Off-Broadway play as a child . {PERSON[Johansson]} made her film debut in the fantasy comedy North ( 1994 ) , and was nominated for an Independent Spirit Award for {PERSON[Manny]} Lo ( 1996 ) . She gained further recognition for her work in The Horse Whisperer ( 1998 ) and Ghost World ( 2001 ) . {PERSON[Johansson]} shifted to adult roles in 2003 with her performances in Lost in Translation ( for which she won a BAFTA Award for Best Actress ) and Girl with a Pearl Earring . She was nominated for four Golden Globe Awards for these films , and for playing an estranged teenager in the drama A Love Song for {PERSON[Bobby_Long]} ( 2004 ) , and a seductress in the psychological thriller Match Point ( 2005 ) . Other films during this period include the mystery thriller The Prestige ( 2006 ) and the comedy-drama {PERSON[Vicky_Cristina_Barcelona]} ( 2008 ) . She also released two albums : Anywhere I Lay My Head ( 2008 ) and Break Up ( 2009 ) , both of which charted on the Billboard 200 . In 2010 , {PERSON[Johansson]} debuted on {LOCATION[Broadway]} in a revival of A View from the Bridge , which won her a Tony Award for Best Featured Actress . Later that year , she began portraying Black Widow in the Marvel Cinematic Universe . She voiced an intelligent computer operating system in the 2013 comedy-drama Her , and played an alien in the 2013 science fiction film Under the Skin , and a woman with psychokinetic abilities in the 2014 science fiction action {PERSON[Lucy]} . She was the highest-grossing actress of 2016 , and is also the highest-grossing actress of all time in {LOCATION[North_America]} in nominal dollar terms . As a public figure , {PERSON[Johansson]} is a {LOCATION[Hollywood]} sex symbol . She is a prominent celebrity brand endorser , and also supports various charities and causes . She has been married twice , to the Canadian actor {PERSON[Ryan_Reynolds]} from 2008 to 2011 and the French businessman {PERSON[Romain_Dauriac]} ( with whom she has a daughter ) from 2014 to 2017 . {PERSON[Scarlett_Ingrid_Johansson]} ( ; born November 22 , 1984 ) is an {MISC[American]} actress and singer . {PERSON[Johansson]} is the world 's highest-paid actress , has made multiple appearances in the {MISC[Forbes_Celebrity]} 100 , and has a star on the {ORGANIZATION[Hollywood_Walk_of_Fame]} . She gained further recognition for her work in The {ORGANIZATION[Horse_Whisperer]} ( 1998 ) and {PERSON[Ghost_World]} ( 2001 ) . {PERSON[Johansson]} shifted to adult roles in 2003 with her performances in {LOCATION[Lost]} in Translation ( for which she won a {ORGANIZATION[BAFTA_Award_for_Best_Actress]} ) and {PERSON[Girl]} with a {LOCATION[Pearl_Earring]} . She was nominated for four {MISC[Golden_Globe_Awards]} for these films , and for playing an estranged teenager in the drama A Love Song for {PERSON[Bobby_Long]} ( 2004 ) , and a seductress in the psychological thriller {ORGANIZATION[Match_Point]} ( 2005 ) . She aspired to be an actress from a young age , and first appeared on stage in an Off-Broadway play as a child . {PERSON[Johansson]} made her film debut in the fantasy comedy North ( {DATE[1994]} ) , and was nominated for an {ORGANIZATION[Independent_Spirit_Award_for_Manny_]} ( {DATE[1996]} ) . She gained further recognition for her work in The Horse Whisperer ( {DATE[1998]} ) and Ghost World ( 2001 ) . Johansson shifted to adult roles in {DATE[2003]} with her performances in Lost in Translation ( for which she won a BAFTA Award for Best Actress ) and Girl with a {LOCATION[Pearl_Earring]} . She was nominated for four Golden Globe Awards for these films , and for playing an estranged teenager in the drama A Love Song for Bobby Long ( 2004 ) , and a seductress in the psychological thriller Match Point ( {DATE[2005]} ) . Other films during this period include the mystery thriller The Prestige ( {DATE[2006]} ) and the comedy-drama {PERSON[Vicky_Cristina_Barcelona]} ( 2008 ) . She also released two albums : Anywhere I Lay My Head ( 2008 ) and Break Up ( {DATE[2009]} ) , both of which charted on the Billboard 200 . In {DATE[2010]} , {PERSON[Johansson]} debuted on Broadway in a revival of A View from the Bridge , which won her a {ORGANIZATION[Tony_Award_for_Best_Featured_Actress]} . Later that year , she began portraying Black Widow in the {ORGANIZATION[Marvel_Cinematic_Universe]} . She voiced an intelligent computer operating system in the {DATE[2013]} comedy-drama Her , and played an alien in the {DATE[2013]} science fiction film Under the Skin , and a woman with psychokinetic abilities in the {DATE[2014]} science fiction action Lucy . She was the highest-grossing actress of {DATE[2016]} , and is also the highest-grossing actress of all time in {LOCATION[North_America]} in nominal dollar terms . As a public figure , {PERSON[Johansson]} is a Hollywood sex symbol . She is a prominent celebrity brand endorser , and also supports various charities and causes . She has been married twice , to the Canadian actor {PERSON[Ryan_Reynolds]} from {DATE[2008]} to {DATE[2011]} and the French businessman {PERSON[Romain_Dauriac]} ( with whom she has a daughter ) from {DATE[2014]} to {DATE[2017]} .
